example.eg: The helicopter hovered above the baseball stadium.
example.egtrans: 直升机在棒球场上空盘旋。

example.eg: Four youths seen hovering in the vicinity of the incident were arrested by police.
example.egtrans: 四名被发现在案发地点附近徘徊的年轻人被警察逮捕。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 徘徊, 在附近闲逛, 在周围游荡

example.eg: Peter hovered at the door for a moment before going inside.
example.egtrans: 彼得在进门前犹豫了一会儿。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 犹豫, 彷徨, 踌躇

example.eg: The growth rate is hovering at about 1% this year.
example.egtrans: 今年的增长率在1％附近小幅波动。

dsense.name: hover around, also UK: hover about

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在周围逗留, 在附近徘徊

example.eg: A police helicopter hovered over the building in which the terrorists had taken refuge.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 盘旋于, 在…上空盘旋

example.eg: Jeff's new boss was always hovering over him and making him feel uncomfortable and nervous.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （不耐烦地在附近）徘徊, 守候

example.eg: You can hover over a link to see the full URL.

dsense.name: hover your mouse over [sth], hover your cursor over [sth]

example.eg: Hover your mouse over the image for more information.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将鼠标停留在, 将光标停留在
